allow: Bash(Rename-Item -LiteralPath "C:\\Users\\bobla\\files-to-rename\\20201204154403_001.pdf" -NewName "Other, Tower One Cafe, Weekly Lunch Specials Menu Nov 30 to Dec 4, Bob, 12-4-2020.pdf")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File - <<'PWSH'
$file = Get-Item -LiteralPath 'C:\\Users\\bobla\\files-to-rename\\Other, Tower One Cafe, Weekly Lunch Specials Menu Nov 30 to Dec 4, Bob, 12-4-2020.pdf'
$date = Get-Date '12/4/2020 00:00:00'
$file.CreationTime = $date
$file.LastWriteTime = $date
$file.LastAccessTime = $date
Write-Output 'Timestamps set successfully'
Get-Item -LiteralPath $file.FullName | Select-Object Name, CreationTime, LastWriteTime, LastAccessTime
PWSH)

Bash(cmd /c "rename ""C:\\Users\\bobla\\files-to-rename\\Invoice, Computer Hospital, Windows 10 Pro Install For 6 Optiplex, AFCA, .00, 3-29-2021.pdf"" ""Invoice, Computer Hospital, Windows 10 Pro Install For 6 Optiplex, AFCA, $525.00, 3-29-2021.pdf""")
